    • 构造器详细资料

      • DeltaBitOutput

        public DeltaBitOutput()
        Creates a new ByteBufferBitOutput with a default allocated size of 4096 bytes.

      • DeltaBitOutput

        public DeltaBitOutput(int initialSize)
        Give an initialSize different than DEFAULT_ALLOCATIONS. Recommended to use values which are dividable by 4096.
        参数:
        initialSize - New initialsize to use

    • 方法详细资料

      • writeBit

        public void writeBit()
        Sets the next bit (or not) and moves the bit pointer.

      • skipBit

        public void skipBit()

      • writeBits

        public void writeBits(long value,
                      int bits)
        Writes the given long to the stream using bits amount of meaningful bits. This command does not check input values, so if they're larger than what can fit the bits (you should check this before writing), expect some weird results.
        参数:
        value - Value to be written to the stream
        bits - How many bits are stored to the stream

      • flush

        public void flush()
        Causes the currently handled word to be written to the stream

      • getLongArray

        public long[] getLongArray()
